name: numerachrom
description:
match colors or numbers in this high-speed action puzzler (think "uno" rules).

wasd or arrow keys to move. time will run out if you go too long without eating an orb. run out of time or eat the wrong orb and it's game over.

art by kenney :) https://www.kenney.nl/

sfx derived from public domain assets or recorded by me

menu music is "two moons" by bobby richards [youtube audio library]

gameplay music is "brass orchid" by bobby richards [youtube aduio library]
